name: button_press
description: This function is used to mimic pressing a button on a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to press the button.

parameters.name: predefinedButton
parameters.description: The predefined button to be pressed.

parameters.name: predefinedScreenPosition
parameters.description: The predefined screen position to be pressed.
